full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Filing Cabinet Purchase

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01008556
**Solicitation Number**: ISED204124

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Description**: Government agency Industry Canada is seeking bids for the purchase of lateral filing cabinets. 

**Closing Date**: October 25, 2022, 14:00:00

The proposed procurement is governed by the following rules:
* Competitive - Selective tendering
* Priority given to bidders that meet the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB) criteria
* Target geographic regions: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Attachments**:
   * [Notice of Proposed Procurement](link)
   * [Request for Bid](link)
   * [Bidder Q&A Response for Question 1](link)
   * [Bidder Q&A Response for Question 2](link)
   * [Bidder Q&A Response for Question N/A](link)

**Contract Information**:
  * If resulting contract is within the jurisdiction of the Competition Bureau, the resulting contract will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service website
  * Suppliers who did not participate in the pre-procurement activities may request to address any recommendations or observations with the Contracting Officer.
  * The contract is not subject to the Subject Matter Experts (SME) provisions.

**Additional Contact Details**:
   * [Contracting Officer]: Nathalie Craig
   * [Contracting Agency]: Industry Canada
   * [Contact Address]: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H5

Please refer to the attachments for more detailed information and contact the contracting agency for any additional questions. 

### Note: 
   The opportunities listed here are confidential and will be awarded on a proposal evaluation basis. Suppliers are solely responsible for enquiring about the current status of this bid prior to the stated closing date. 

**Warning:**
   In the interests of fairness and integrity, if your organization has provided information regarding this opportunity in public domains or publish it through proprietary means, complete and unconditional withdrawal from the current bid process is required.

Maintaining the integrity of the procurement process is paramount. Misconduct may result in ineligibility from participating in future government procurement activities.

Note: You should delete any attachments before upload to Git platform.
